cs213.photoAlbum.model

Interface Album

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Album>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyAlbum

    public interface Album
extends java.lang.Comparable<Album>
    Album Interface describes the album object. The album object holds a collection of photo objects as a list. Each photo in the album has to have a unique file name.
    Author:
    Nadiia Chepurko

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPhoto(Photo photo)
      Adds a photo object to this album if it is not already in it.
      int compareTo(Album other) 
      void deletePhoto(java.lang.String fileName)
      Deletes a photo specified by the name of the file.
      java.lang.String getName()
      This method is used to get the name of this album object.
      java.util.List<Photo> getPhotos()
      Returns a list containing all photos in this album.
      void recaption(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String newCaption)
      This method changes the caption of a specified photo object in this album.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        This method is used to get the name of this album object.
        Returns:
        Name of this Album.

      • getPhotos

        java.util.List<Photo> getPhotos()
        Returns a list containing all photos in this album.
        Returns:
        List of photos in this album as a list.

      • addPhoto

        void addPhoto(Photo photo)
        Adds a photo object to this album if it is not already in it.
        Parameters:
        photo - Photo object to be added.

      • deletePhoto

        void deletePhoto(java.lang.String fileName)
        Deletes a photo specified by the name of the file. If the photo is not in the album nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to be deleted.

      • recaption

        void recaption(java.lang.String fileName,
               java.lang.String newCaption)
        This method changes the caption of a specified photo object in this album.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File name of the photo to be re captioned.
        newCaption - The new caption of the photo.

      • compareTo

        int compareTo(Album other)
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Album>
